name: Wish Upon a Star
desc: Bringing this Curio into an Adventure Domain will cause the domain's time limit to be increased by 50%. You will also get an additional chest upon entering this domain. This Curio will be destroyed after the effect has been triggered 2 times
bg_desc: Meteorites fell across all corners of the cosmos. People once claimed they could hear these rocks communicating with humans, luring people to wish upon them. Can they truly grant any and all wishes without a cost? It's said that there's an organization that strides between stars solely to uncover the mystery behind the meteorites. No one knows whether these rocks are an Aeon's blessings, or whether everyone has been drawn into an artificial conspiracy.
